creator: jeremy@logic-users.org
text:
SPECS/httpd.spec line 20: db3-devel should be db4-devel
(in the list of BuildPrereq's)

using CentOS 3.1 (free RedHat ES3 clone)... I have db4 and db4-devel installed,
can't find a db3-devel. I change the '3' to a '4' in the httpd.spec and it has
compiled fine, and I saw it using some db4 files, so I'm assuming it really
should be db4-devel, not just for me.

Cheers!

creator: jorton@redhat.com
text:
Thanks for the report; this has already been fixed for the 2.0.51 release.

http://cvs.apache.org/viewcvs.cgi/httpd-2.0/build/rpm/httpd.spec.in?r1=1.1.2.4&r2=1.1.2.5&only_with_tag=APACHE_2_0_BRANCH
